name: Full stack developer
description:
Please provide your CV in English language when applying to this position.

Our tech stack: Angular for the Front-End, Java/Spring for the Back-End, hosted in AWS (eks+fragate, cloudfront).

WHAT ARE YOUR TASKS?

  • Design of software and systems integration architecture, defining coding conventions and patterns
  • Development, debugging and documenting of the software
  • Test and software development lifecycle automation in line with CI/CD best practices

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING IN

  • Working experience as a backend/front-end software engineer of at least 3 years
  • Good knowledge of Java 8 or higher (Concurrency, Collections, Streams)
  • Experience with Spring Framework (Spring Boot and Spring Cloud is a plus)
  • Good knowledge of Angular 8 or higher
  • Experience in design and development of microservice architecture and REST / HATEOAS APIs
  • Very good understanding of object-oriented design, knowledge of design patterns (GoF, DI, MVC), data structures and algorithms.
  • Good knowledge of at least one relational database (Postgres preferred)
  • English (B2 or higher), sufficient for professional communication
  • Resident of Russian Federation for tax purposes

WILL BE A PLUS:

  • Experience of working in large commercial projects in healthcare or finance and/or in international teams
  • Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, etc) and containers (docker, k8s)
  • Familiarity with DevOps processes, tools and concepts
  • Familiarity with Salesforce
  • German language (B1 or higher)

WHAT WE OFFER

  • Flexible remote work with regular travel to Germany.
  • Full-time employment in accordance with Labor Code of Russian Federation and additional benefits within 12 months.
  • Activities with an extremely steep learning curve in a highly motivated team
  • Broad, varied tasks with the option to take on responsibility quickly
  • Industry-standard salaries with adaptation to your individual abilities
  • Appreciation, flat hierarchies, shared growth and vibrant interaction
  • Career growth opportunities and relocation possibility
  • Free space for your ideas
